description:
Harness the power of physics to get comfortable. This ultralight sleeping pad suits adventures in all 4 seasons. The WingLock™ valve is as easy to use as a water bottle cap and 1-way flow means no wasted breaths. The inner construction and a reflective ThermaCapture™ barrier keep you warm on expeditions and winter adventures. Both the reflective barrier and inner cells use lightweight materials that add warmth without compromising weight or packability.

  • 30-denier soft, grippy nylon on top keeps you from sliding off and the 70-denier nylon bottom holds up during extended expedition use
  • Triangular Core Matrix™ construction and reflective ThermaCapture™ technology provides great comfort, warmth and stability
  • WingLock™ valve is 3x faster than conventional valves
  • 1-way airflow is quick and easy to operate even while wearing gloves
  • Deflates almost instantly for quick and easy packing
  • Rectangular shape offers maximum coverage and warmth
  • Included: Thermarest® pump sack, stuff sack, and repair kit
name: Therm-a-Rest NeoAir XTherm NXT MAX Sleeping Pad - Unisex
